## ClampNode class

Clamps a value to a specified range

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ClampNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns min(max(x, minVal), maxVal). Constrains x to be between minVal and maxVal. All three inputs must be the same type (float, vec2, vec3, or vec4). Component-wise for vectors.
